TopicTitle: Moon pod stuck in middle of Mun

Articles.Content:
Hello,

 

I managed to land a control pod on Mun, but I didn't have enough fuel to leave so I started a rescue mission, but the problem is that when I go to look at the location of the pod on Mun, it looks like it has gotten stuck at the center of Mun after I look at is from the tracking station.

 

Any tips? It's possible Ive done something wrong.

 

Ive attached a screenshot, the altitude makes no sense and you can see the vehicle icon peeking out from Mun's surface.

 

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2943817441
